title: NoLimits Roller Coaster Simulator 1.7 + Extras.rar
description:
No Limits is a rollercoaster creation/ride tool/game where you can make 27 different types of modern roller-coasters ( this list is always being expanded ) without the restrictions you have in other coaster games like RTC, theres no hot dog stands to worry about or peeps to amuse. It`s just you versus physics.

Can you make a coaster that is not just awesome but which won`t kill people? Trust me it is a harder challenge than you may believe.

This is the latest version as well as a collection of third party tools to help make your coasters the best on earth.

There are many more coasters to try and a bustling community of other coaster creators on the following sites.
 <a href="
http://www.coastersims.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.coastersims.com</a> <a href="
http://www.coastercrazy.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.coastercrazy.com</a>

Official No Limits Site : http://www.nolimitscoaster.com/

Originaly packed + cracked by The One Eyed Dude, 

Update + Extras added by HPB.

This pack includes :
 
No Limits 1.6 + Serial Key + Registry BAT file.
No Limits 1.6 to 1.7 update installer.
NL Construction Kit. (Create Extra stuff for your coasters)
NL Elementary. (Helps make specific trick segments for use in NL)
NL Object Creator. (Create 3D scenery objects to enhance your coasters)
NL Automatic Heartline Generator. (Make your coasters super smoooth)
NL Terragen SkyBoxer. (Create new environment Skyboxes)
NL Coaster Calculator. (Helps you work out angles and G forces)
NL Tunnel Maker. (Make new tunnel forms instead of the default ones)
NL Media Centre. (Manage all your coasters and their custom data)
NL Screen Saver. (Turn your favourite coasters into your screen saver)
NL ToolBox. (Various other tools)
NL Track Packager. (Pack your coaster and all its custom data into one nice neat file)
Terragen. (Create amazing quality landscapes to build your coasters in)

Out of all the tools only Terragen has to be installed, the rest should run straight from the .exe`s
